name: Meltem Demirors
position: Chief Strategy Officer at CoinShares, Head of CS Treasury
quote: From 2015 until now, Meltem has provided strong guidance on our fundraising and go-to-market strategies. As we moved from ascribe.io to BigchainDB and now to Ocean Protocol, her wisdom has been invaluable.

name: Dr. Carsten Stöcker
quote: Carsten shares deep insights on IoT, energy and identity solutions that can integrate into Ocean Protocol, as well as giving us his futuristic viewpoints to help us see around the corner.

name: Prof. Dr. Sebastian Gajek
quote: Sebastian gave us great insights in their Token Curation development such as the graded TCR. More importantly, many of their developments, research and insights are being widely shared in the open source community.

name: Adam Drake
quote: Adam is both, a world-class data scientist and a world-class manager of data scientists & engineers.

name: Chris Ballinger
quote: We are excited about Chris’ insight and guidance on how we can further the goals of MOBI by using Ocean Protocol as a secure, data exchange protocol for solving mobility challenges.

name: Jason Teutsch
quote: Jason Teutsch is the founder of TrueBit. He is a mathematician and computer scientist whose research focuses on distributed systems security, game theory, and algorithmic randomness.

name: Peter Wang
quote: We’re working closely with Peter to provide seamless and powerful tooling for data scientists, to co-create a future that equalizes the opportunity to access data & AI services.

name: Andreas Mueller
position: Author of Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
quote: Andreas Mueller is one of the core creators of the beloved machine learning tool scikit-learn. We're proud to have him as an advisor to Ocean Protocol.

name: Luis Cuende
quote: Luis Cuende is the founder of Aragon- a network and tooling for blockchain governance, and one of the top experts in the blockchain space

name: Simon de la Rouviere
quote: Simon’s quick, curious, and broad-thinking mind will be helpful as we build & grow the Ocean ecosystem, in everything from incentives for data commons to price-setting for data markets.

name: Azeem Azhar
quote: Azeem Azhar is a seasoned technologist & manager, and doesn’t shy away from making his case about what’s important and what we might do about it.

name: Amir Banifatemi
position: Co-Founder of AI for Good & General Manager at AI XPrize
quote: Amir is General Manager of the AI & Frontier Tech Initiatives group at XPRIZE Foundation. He is a leader in the global AI for Good movement, as epitomized by the global “AI for Good Global Summit” that he co-organizes.
